mapper.insert: insert into replyBoard(orderNum, bno, user_ID, reply) values (#{orderNum}, #{bno}, #{user_ID}, #{reply})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from replyBoard where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) as count from replyBoard where orderNum = #{orderNum} and user_ID = #{user_ID}
mapper.update: update replyBoard set reply = #{reply}, R_updateDate = now() where orderNum = #{orderNum}
mapper.insert: insert into CUSTOMERBOARD(rno, bno, user_ID, money) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{user_ID}, #{money})
